version_description: This new version fixes the issue that prevented some of you of making calls since the last update.

Update your app and enjoy the new features:

* Display of calls duration on call logs
* Option to remove call history

Enjoying the new Libon? Please take a few minutes to review our app!
Your feedback helps us make things better. Send us your comments: feedback@libon.com
We’ve fixed some minor bugs and implemented a few improvements to make your calling experience smoother on Libon!
We’ve fixed some minor bugs and implemented a few improvements to make your calling experience smoother on Libon!

This update fixes the call issue on 4G/3G and Wifi that some of you may have experienced since the last update.
We also have made some updates and bug fixes to give you the best experience possible. Thanks for using Libon!
We have made some updates and bug fixes to give you the best experience possible. Thanks for using Libon!
We have made some updates and bug fixes to give you the best experience possible. Thanks for using Libon!

We’ve fixed some minor bugs and implemented a few improvements to make your calling experience smoother on Libon!
To ensure a better experience we now support all iOS versions starting from iOS 9

We’ve fixed some minor bugs and implemented a few improvements to make your calling experience smoother on Libon!
To ensure a better experience we now support all iOS versions starting from iOS 9

We’ve fixed some minor bugs and implemented a few improvements to make your calling experience smoother on Libon!
To ensure a better experience we now support all iOS versions starting from iOS 9

We’ve fixed some minor bugs and implemented a few improvements to make your calling experience smoother on Libon!
To ensure a better experience we now support all iOS versions starting from iOS 9

We added support for 3D Touch: pressing the Libon icon on the Home screen gives you instant access to your last 3 calls so you can start a call faster!
This version includes also some performance improvements and minor bug fixes.
We have made some updates and bug fixes to give you the best experience possible. Thanks for using Libon!

We're happy to offer you 2 new features from both dialpad and contact list:
-New design feature to display your remaining minutes for every operator before placing calls!
-You can now select the best deals directly from the phone number you want to call

Now you can call your contacts using Libon directly from your native dialer. Just long press the call button and select Libon!
And to help you choose among our offers, we now display the contacts you can call with each offer.

Check out our brand new deals to make high quality calls at the best rate to: Algeria, Burkina Faso, Guinea, Indonesia, Cuba, Gabon, Lebanon and Saudi Arabia.
We have also made some updates and bug fixes to give you the best experience possible on Libon.

Guess what? The hide my number feature is now back! From the menu of the app, you can now decide to display or not your number for your next Libon call.
We’ve have also optimized Libon for IOS 11, fixed some minor bugs and implemented a few improvements to make your calling experience smoother on Libon!

- Compatibility with iPhone X
- Some performance improvements and minor bug fixes
To prepare great new features, we need to optimize our legacy. Be ready for brighter future
Avoid waking up your family in the middle of the night by checking the local time of your callee directly from Libon!

Five can refer to:
- the third prime number
- our five senses
- our basic tastes (and not 4...)
- the quantity of magical rocks in Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
- the number of buttons in the new Libon tab bar

Once upon a time, a young lady, named Swift, was dreaming to become a superhero and not a tailor!
After couple of trials, Swift proved her capacity and she was invited to join the Liboner team, the super hero team who are protecting Libon town.
Day after day, her reputation was growing! She decided to make her wish a reality: Become the Liboner leader !!!
But how to challenge Lord C++? Lord C++ has an amazing knowledge about the legacy of Libon town and he’s ruling this team since so many times...
It’s OK! She will learn how to be a great leader because she knows “With great power comes great responsibility”
We made for you a new call log. I hope you'll enjoy it!

- Based on your feedback, we've improved the interface to make it even easier to use ;)
- Fought nasty bugs on iPhone X
Avoid waking up your family in the middle of the night by checking the local time of your callee directly from Libon!
Avoid waking up your family in the middle of the night by checking the local time of your callee directly from Libon!

What's the difference between a good designer and a bad designer? Oops, sorry old french joke...
A customer who chooses the right minutes is an happy customer and we love when you are happy! If ever you choose minutes that are only for landlines, it's now more visible #meaculpa
No big change in this release but great features are coming soon #CallKit
GDPR is everywhere: Data privacy is really important so we decided we won't limit this feature to European users. The respect for your privacy is available for everybody #PrivacyByDesign

We are happy & proud to deliver you this new release compliant with CallKit! It was important for us to integrate this native iOS feature and we'll improve our compatibilty on the next coming releases. As usual, your feedbacks are welcome!

Libon SAS is very proud to offer you its first official release on the AppStore :D We maintain our commitment to offer you high quality calls and we will continue to deal with operators to bring you the best rates!
This change of ownership means that when the application is launched for the 1st time, you will have to confirm your telephone number. To make it easier, your keyboard will suggest the code automatically, no need to type it ;P

Libon SAS is very proud to offer you its first official release on the AppStore :D We maintain our commitment to offer you high quality calls and we will continue to deal with operators to bring you the best rates!
This change of ownership means that when the application is launched for the 1st time, you will have to confirm your telephone number. To make it easier, your keyboard will suggest the code automatically, no need to type it ;P

PS: Thanks to Aymeric who helped us to solve the "cancelled by user" issue

We update our design, now Libon has four tabs: Calls, contacts, Shop and Account!
Your minutes are moved in Account

Do you like it?

Wasa-b!
